Description: All Annual Meeting attendees are invited to participate in this special evening session hosted by the AACR Chemistry in Cancer Research (CICR) Working Group, including the current Working Group Chair, Dr. Mary M. Mader and Immediate Past-Chair, Dr. Joachim Rudolph. The 2023 CICR Town Hall will feature three presentations  on the theme of Molecular Glues in Cancer Drug Discovery. The Town Hall also includes a Networking Reception at the beginning and conclusion of the session.
SearchResultBody: TM04. Sticking it to Cancer with Molecular Glues: A Chemistry in Cancer Research Working Group Town Hall Meeting and Networking Reception
Title: Sticking it to Cancer with Molecular Glues: A Chemistry in Cancer Research Working Group Town Hall Meeting and Networking Reception
